original_title: 一ヶ月間の禁欲の果てに彼女のルームメイト2人と浮気SEXだけに没頭した彼女不在の3日間。
overview: My girlfriend is sharing a room with two friends, Tsuaksa and Sayaka. I also go to that house once in a while, but I confessed that I fell in love with my older and cool roommate Tsukasa. Tsuaksa said she and Sayaka will have sex with me if I abstinence for a month. One day my girlfriend has to go on a trip...
title: After Abstaining From Sex For A Month, I Lost My Mind Having Nothing But Infidelity Sex With My Girlfriend’s 2 Roommates While She Was Away For 3 Days
